actions.name: Grapple
actions.hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 11). At the start of the abomination's next turn, it uses Post-Mortem Explosion.

features.name: Aggressive
features.description: As a bonus action, the abomination can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

features.name: Post-Mortem Explosion
features.description: When the abomination dies, it explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 2m of it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that is grappled by the abomination automatically fails its saving throw.
